params.registerer: The address of the account used to register the schema.

params.uid: The UID of the schema to retrieve.

params.revocable: Whether the schema allows revocations explicitly.

returns._0: The UID of the new schema.
Semver contract version as a string.

Registered(bytes32,address,(bytes32,addr.notice: Emitted when a new schema has been registered

getSchema(bytes32).notice: Returns an existing schema by UID

register(string,address,bool).notice: Submits and reserves a new schema

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.
